summary: The user requested removing manual slash command usage, leading to an update in CLAUDE.md that prioritizes autonomous Python script execution over user recommendations. Subsequently, the user identified the .claude/agents directory as potential technical debt, prompting an analysis which confirmed these agents are vestigial compared to direct usage of scripts like council.py.
current_topic: Workflow Automation and Deprecating Vestigial Agents
key_decisions: Claude will no longer recommend slash commands but will execute the underlying Python scripts autonomously.
The Assistant's role concept was updated from 'Orchestrator' to 'Autonomous Engineer'.
The .claude/agents directory is confirmed as vestigial and obsolete compared to direct script execution.
